languages.text: "Руны не лгут, Ульфар. Ты знаешь это. Я сожалею о твоих братьях, но судьба их ясна".
"The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."
languages.original_text: "Руны не лгут, Ульфар. Ты знаешь это. Я сожалею о твоих братьях, но судьба их ясна".

traits.locale_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “符文从不说谎，乌尔法，你心知肚明。我为你的兄弟们感到遗憾，但他们的命运已昭然若揭。”
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: “符文从不说谎，乌尔法，你心知肚明。我为你的兄弟们感到遗憾，但他们的命运已昭然若揭。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「ルーンは嘘をつかない。ウルファー、分かってるだろ。お前の同胞のことは遺憾だが、あいつらの運命は明白だよ」
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: 「ルーンは嘘をつかない。ウルファー、分かってるだろ。お前の同胞のことは遺憾だが、あいつらの運命は明白だよ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Las runas no mienten y lo sabes, Ulfar. Lo siento por tus hermanos, pero su destino es el que es».
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: «Las runas no mienten y lo sabes, Ulfar. Lo siento por tus hermanos, pero su destino es el que es».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Tu sais très bien que les runes ne mentent pas, Ulfar. Aussi regrettable que ce soit, le sort de tes frères ne fait aucun doute. »
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: « Tu sais très bien que les runes ne mentent pas, Ulfar. Aussi regrettable que ce soit, le sort de tes frères ne fait aucun doute. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Die Runen lügen nicht, Ulfar, das wisst Ihr. Es tut mir leid um Eure Brüder, aber ihr Schicksal ist eindeutig."
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: "Die Runen lügen nicht, Ulfar, das wisst Ihr. Es tut mir leid um Eure Brüder, aber ihr Schicksal ist eindeutig."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Rünler yalan söylemez Ulfar, biliyorsun. Kardeşlerin için üzgünüm ama kaderleri çoktan yazıldı."
languages.original_text: "The runes do not lie, Ulfar, you know this. I am sorry about your brothers, but their fate is clear."

traits.locale_text: "Rünler yalan söylemez Ulfar, biliyorsun. Kardeşlerin için üzgünüm ama kaderleri çoktan yazıldı."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
